course.title: ADM 6367 Technology Policy and Research and Development Management (3 units)
course.desc: The relationship between R and D and economic progress; elements of the Canadian policy on technology; R and D activities in the private and public sectors; government incentives and support programs; comparison with the policie of other industrial countries; technology planning and R and D management in a Canadian setting: technology forecasting; staffing, structure, strategy and support for R and D.Course Component: LecturePrerequisites: ADM 5330, ADM 5351, ADM 5352
